[爾]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – cloth on a loom, with threads crossing – original form of 檷 ( OC *niːlʔ , “loom”). Later phonetically borrowed as an instance of jiajie ( 假借 ) to represent 爾 ( OC *njelʔ , “you”).

[尔]
Variant of 尒 , which is in turn an abridgement of 爾 .
Officially adopted as the simplified form of 爾 in the Chinese Character Simplification Scheme ( 《 漢字簡化方案 》 ) in 1956.
